about.column1: In a technology landscape filled with rigid, outmoded solutions, organisations are burdened, unable to move beyond threats and vulnerabilities.
about.column2: By combining Security Data Science with Cyber Tradecraft, we provide our clients with complete clarity of their security Risk.
about.heading: About us.

flexibleContent.heading: We are Prevalent AI. We provide clarity and control.

flexibleContent.content: Prevalent AI was founded to assemble the world’s best Security Data Science talent. A team capable of building the security analytics of the future.
flexibleContent.heading: Pioneering Security Data Science.

noteContent.text: We unify an organisation’s data and provide a single Platform for complete visibility of cyber Risk.
Our Experts build client-specific Analytics, delivering solutions that help organisations better respond to their unique threats.

flexibleContent.content: Cyber security is complex. Threats constantly change and vendors claim to be the silver bullet. Our mission is to simplify security through the application of Security Data Science. We provide our clients with complete clarity of their cyber Risks, allowing them to take control back from attackers.
flexibleContent.heading: Our mission and purpose.

flexibleContent.content: Our leadership boasts decades of experience launching and growing security and Risk management solutions for global organisations.
flexibleContent.heading: Led by industry leaders.

teamMember.description:
For the last decade Paul has launched, grown and successfully exited security, risk management, and analytics technology companies.

He was the co-founder and CEO at Cognevo, a Security Analytics software business acquired by Telstra Corporation, co-founder and COO at Wynyard Group, a global security and crime analytics vendor that he helped guide to IPO in 2013, and the CEO of Methodware, a leading GRC software vendor. He has previously held leadership roles in global technology companies including BAE Systems, Deloitte and Cognizant.
teamMember.name: Paul Stokes

teamMember.description:
Arun is a technology leader with significant service delivery and organisational development experience.

Before founding Prevalent AI, he was the VP of Global Services at Cognevo, where he led a global team of cyber technology specialists, and VP of Services at Methodware, a leading GRC software vendor. His previous work includes senior executive roles at Wynyard Group and Cognizant, where he was responsible for delivering complex transformational technology initiatives.
teamMember.name: Arun Raj

teamMember.description:
Sara leads our People function and brings extensive experience building progressive People practices for high growth software technology companies or driving large scale organisational change programs.

Prior to joining Prevalent AI Sara held several Executive roles as Global Head of HR for Brady Technologies Ltd, a London headquartered business providing commodities trading solutions and HR Director for Cognevo and Wynyard Group.

Sara is the founder of Affilium AB a consultancy firm providing tailored People support for technology focused start and scale ups.
teamMember.name: Sara Mottus

teamMember.description:
Sam has been pioneering cyber security solutions for over 15 years, with extensive technical and operational computer network operations experience.

He was previously General Manager in the UK for Linchpin Labs, the world leader in the privatised intelligence industry, and spent nearly a decade with UK Government leading the design and delivery of cyber offensive technical and operational capability at scale. He has previously held cyber security consultancy roles in the payments industry, and for UK Ministry of Defence.
teamMember.name: Sam Weeks

teamMember.description:
Iain has spent his career in security and intelligence, including six years as the Director of GCHQ, the UK’s largest intelligence and security agency.

At GCHQ he is credited with radically reforming the agency’s role for the cyber security era, spearheading the UK’s first two national Cyber Security strategies and forging strong partnership between government and industry. Iain now advises governments and global businesses on cyber security risk management.
teamMember.name: Sir Iain Lobban KCMG, CB

teamMember.description:
Andrew’s 30-year career at GCHQ culminated in the role of Deputy Director for Cyber Defence Operations.

This included leading the UK’s national cyber defence strategy, with responsibility for both policy and operations. He went on to become the co-founder and CEO of DarkTrace and a co-founder of Cognevo, and is currently a strategic advisor to global banks, multinationals, threat intel providers and security startups.
teamMember.name: Andrew France OBE IEng MIET

teamMember.description:
For the last decade Paul has launched, grown and successfully exited security, risk management, and analytics technology companies.

He was the co-founder and CEO at Cognevo, a Security Analytics software business acquired by Telstra Corporation, co-founder and COO at Wynyard Group, a global security and crime analytics vendor that he helped guide to IPO in 2013, and the CEO of Methodware, a leading GRC software vendor. He has previously held leadership roles in global technology companies including BAE Systems, Deloitte and Cognizant.
teamMember.name: Paul Stokes

teamMember.description:
Arun is a technology leader with significant service delivery and organisational development experience.

Before founding Prevalent AI, he was the VP of Global Services at Cognevo, where he led a global team of cyber technology specialists, and VP of Services at Methodware, a leading GRC software vendor. His previous work includes senior executive roles at Wynyard Group and Cognizant, where he was responsible for delivering complex transformational technology initiatives.
teamMember.name: Arun Raj

teamMember.description:
Jean-Claude (JC) Broido is ISTARI’s Managing Director of Asia Pacific and Japan where he is responsible for ISTARI’s Operations in the region.

JC has 30+ years of experience in Information and Cyber Security Technology during which he has advised many clients on technology led transformations, business resiliency and cyber security risks. Prior to joining ISTARI, JC held a number of roles at IBM, including Vice President of IBM Security, Asia Pacific, and Vice President Business Development for Cloud and Cognitive Solutions. Before IBM, JC spent 5 years in Tokyo as President of McAfee Japan.
teamMember.jobTitle: Managing director, Asia Pacific and Japan, Istari Global
teamMember.name: Jean-Claude (JC) Broido

teamMember.description:
Derek is a Chartered Accountant with extensive experience in growing businesses organically and through M&A across multiple sectors and international locations.

Derek qualified with KPMG and spent 6 years in Audit and Transaction Services before a decade with General Electric, including as CFO for their UK Commercial Finance business. He has held a number of General Management and Finance leadership roles in the UK and globally for both start-up and established businesses. Derek is currently CFO of ISTARI, a Cybersecurity investment management business owned by Temasek and devoted to using its expertise to drive cyber resilience.
teamMember.name: Derek Mochan CA, MCSI

flexibleContent.content: We are a proud member of the ISTARI Collective, a curated network of cyber companies and experts aiming to create a digitally resilient future for businesses. Together, we provide our clients with a holistic suite of capabilities and services to improve their cyber resilience.
flexibleContent.heading: Innovating cyber security with ISTARI.

flexibleContent.content: Learn more about the thriving community facilitating communication and collaboration between Managed Security providers. The MSF and its members work together to produce Managed Security industry-focused research, publications, analysis and more.
flexibleContent.heading: Join the thriving Managed Security community.

flexibleContent.content: Join the team solving problems, cracking complexity and pioneering innovative cyber technology. We welcome exceptional applicants from diverse backgrounds.
flexibleContent.heading: We work with extraordinary people.

footerCta.content: Our team of experts thrives when tackling complex cyber challenges. If you have one, we want to hear from you.
footerCta.heading: We seek the toughest cyber problems.

guides.guide: MSF Guide to UK Managed Security
Managed Security and 3rd Party Risk Opportunity

cta.content: Learn how we’re helping global organisations take control of their cyber technology.
cta.heading: What we do

items.summary: A single, unified place for complex, disparate data.
A team of data scientists, engineers and analysts.
Learn more about the team behind Prevalent AI.
Whitepapers, blog articles, podcasts and more.
